topic: r4 Family Instance Types Deprecation Information

  entities:
  
    r4 family|Product
    Neptune|Service
  
  proposition: The r4 family is a family of instance types.
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    
    entity-attributes:
    r4 family|TYPE|family of instance types
      
  proposition: The r4 family of instance types is deprecated.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    r4 family|STATUS|deprecated
    
  proposition: The r4 family was offered when Neptune was launched in 2018.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    r4 family|OFFERED_WITH|Neptune
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune|LAUNCH_DATE|2018
    
  proposition: Newer instance types offer much better price/performance than the r4 family.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    r4 family|PERFORMANCE|much worse price/performance than newer instance types
    
  proposition: As of engine version 1.1.0.0, Neptune no longer supports r4 instance types.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
    Neptune|SUPPORTS|r4 family
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune|SUPPORT_STATUS|no longer supports r4 instance types as of engine version 1.1.0.0
    
  proposition: Neptune was launched in 2018.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune|LAUNCH_DATE|2018
    
  proposition: Neptune is a service that supports various instance types.
  
    entity-entity relationships:
  
    entity-attributes:
    Neptune|TYPE|service
    Neptune|CAPABILITY|supports various instance types
